attributes.action: recognise that most air travellers pose no risk at all and that the introduction of body scanners at airports is totall unacceptable. Profiling passengers is a much more effective way of identifying possible terrorists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Treating everyone as a potential bomber is totally unacceptable. The overwhelming majority of air travellers present no threat to anyone yet they are still treated as if they did. Profiling is a far better way of detecting potential terrorists, not subjected everyone to the indignity of a full body scan. Will the Queen have to be scanned as well whenever she travels ?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
